description: Seminars allow in-depth study of particular themes or topics in psychology. See department Website for descriptions and additional prerequisites. Offered annually. May be repeated if topic is different. Prerequisite: PSYCH 230.
name: Sem: Close Relat Across Lifespan
notes: Full topic title: Seminar: Close Relationships Across the Lifespan
